text: Ikabheje a Kilishitu bhashikutupa Mbumu jwa Ukonjelo. Na pabha Mbumu jwa Ukonjelo anatama nkati jetu, nkapinjikwanga kujiganywa naka mundu jojowe, pabha Mbumu jwabho anakunnjiganyanga indu yowe. Jwene Mbumujo anakunjiganyanga ya kweli na wala akabheleketa unami. Bhai malinga Mbumu shakuti kunjiganyanga, ntamangane nkati ja a Kilishitu.
